Directions: In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the milk, pecans, coconut and vanilla; mix well. Shape into 1-in. balls. Refrigerate for 30-45 minutes or until firm.
In a heavy saucepan or microwave, melt the chips and shortening; stir until smooth.  Dip balls and place on waxed paper to set. Store in an airtight container.
